Source code for PPVD.style

[docs]class TerminalStyle:
    """
    Font styles for printing to terminal
    """
    RED = "\u001b[31m"
    GREEN = "\u001b[32m"
    BLUE = "\u001b[38;5;39m"
    YELLOW = "\u001b[38;5;11m"
    ORANGE = "\u001b[38;5;208m"
    BOLD = "\u001b[1m"
    UNDERLINE = "\u001b[7m"
    RESET = "\033[0m"
